title: Spaghetti Bolognese
author: CookingEnthusiast123
instructions: Boil spaghetti. Brown beef, add onion and garlic. Mix with tomato sauce. Serve over spaghetti.

title: Vegetarian Stir-Fry
author: VeggieChef
instructions: Stir-fry tofu and vegetables in soy sauce and ginger. Serve over rice.

title: Classic Chocolate Cake
author: SweetTooth
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add wet ingredients. Bake until a toothpick comes out clean.

title: Mango Salsa Chicken
author: FlavorExplorer
instructions: Grill chicken. Dice mango, pepper, and onion. Mix with chopped cilantro, lime juice, and olive oil.

title: Caprese Salad
author: FreshDelights
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. Arrange with fresh basil. Drizzle with balsamic glaze and olive oil. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Garlic Butter Shrimp
author: SeafoodMaster
instructions: Saute shrimp in garlic butter until cooked. Squeeze lemon juice and sprinkle parsley before serving.

title: Quinoa Salad
author: HealthyEater
instructions: Cook quinoa. Mix with chopped vegetables, feta cheese, olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano.

title: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
author: ItalianChef
instructions: Cook pasta. Saute chicken and garlic. Mix with cream, parmesan, and butter. Toss with cooked pasta.

title: Berry Smoothie Bowl
author: SmoothieFanatic
instructions: Blend berries, banana, and yogurt. Pour into a bowl. Top with granola and drizzle honey.

title: Pesto Pasta with Cherry Tomatoes
author: PastaLover
instructions: Cook pasta. Mix with pesto, halved cherry tomatoes, parmesan, and pine nuts.

title: Teriyaki Salmon
author: AsianFlavors
instructions: Marinate salmon in teriyaki sauce. Grill or bake until salmon is cooked through.

title: Greek Salad
author: MediterraneanCuisine
instructions: Chop vegetables and mix with olives, feta, oregano, and olive oil. Toss before serving.

title: Honey Mustard Chicken
author: FlavorfulDelights
instructions: Mix mustard, honey, rosemary, and garlic. Coat chicken and bake until golden brown.

title: Lemon Blueberry Pancakes
author: BreakfastLover
instructions: Mix pancake batter with blueberries and lemon zest. Cook pancakes until golden brown.

title: Crispy Baked Zucchini Fries
author: HealthySnacker
instructions: Coat zucchini in egg, breadcrumbs, and seasonings. Bake until crispy.

title: Ratatouille
author: FrenchCuisine
instructions: Layer sliced vegetables in a baking dish. Drizzle with olive oil and herbs. Bake until tender.

title: Sushi Rolls
author: SushiMaster
instructions: Spread rice on nori, add fish, avocado, and cucumber. Roll tightly. Slice and serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

title: Pumpkin Soup
author: AutumnHarvest
instructions: Saute onion and garlic. Add pumpkin, broth, coconut milk, and spices. Simmer until pumpkin is tender. Blend until smooth.

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
author: SaladEnthusiast
instructions: Grill chicken. Toss with chopped lettuce, croutons, parmesan, and caesar dressing.

title: Mushroom Risotto
author: RisottoMaster
instructions: Saute mushrooms and onion. Add rice and wine. Gradually add broth until rice is creamy. Stir in parmesan.

title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
author: HealthyChoices
instructions: Cook quinoa. Mix with beans, corn, salsa, and cheese. Stuff into halved bell peppers. Bake until peppers are tender.

title: Cajun Shrimp Pasta
author: SpicyFoodie
instructions: Saute shrimp with cajun seasoning. Add vegetables, cream, and tomatoes. Toss with cooked pasta.
